# name

**Instance Property**

The name of this payment type.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property in conjunction with the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPaymentMethod/identificationHint] property to identify each payment method uniquely.

## Getting the Payment Information

- **type**: The type of account used as the source of funds.
- **INPaymentMethodType**: Constants describing the available payment options.
- **identificationHint**: The hint for identifying the payment method.
- **icon**: The image representing the payment method.
